thread.title: Clark Kegley
thread.title_full: Starfire Direct reviewed by Clark Kegley

author: Clark Kegley
title: Clark Kegley
text:
Built a fire pit in my backyard and needed a good way to support the fire pan and ring.
Did some research and found the StarFire Direct website. They had a great installation video for the ledges and I ordered 7 of them. They arrived last week (quickly) and I installed them today.
They went in easily and worked perfectly.
The fire pit now looks fantastic. I would highly recommend these to anyone building a fire pit.
Great product, great service. Thanks!
